attributes.action: fine people who abuse parent and child parking spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone knows not to park in a disabled parking space as you'll probably get fined. Yet everytime I go shopping I'm forced to try and squeeze my children out of a tiny gap, trying not to damage the car next to mine and leaving the pushchair virtually in the road because everyone who fancies parking close to the shop or doesn't want there car to get damaged see's fit to use the parent and child parking spaces! It needs to stop.

rejection.details: Parent and child parking spaces are administered by the landowner, not by HM Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
